inn1.comm: a full ball outside off stump, a hint of inswing, Rohit moves on to the front foot and pushes the ball towards cover

full length and the line this time is on the pads, Rohit leans across on the front foot and clips the ball to midwicket, the fielder has to move to his right so there's time for a single. Joe Root that was
pitches on a good length and seams across Dhawan, who stays in his crease and defends towards point
full and straight from Anderson, Dhawan square drives from his crease, doesn't beat point

only two slips so the thick outside edge - or was it a half steer? - flies safely towards third man. Anderson took the good length ball away from the left-hander. Dhawan intended to steer it to third man but it was a thick outside edge
defended watchfully from the crease
short of a length first up, Dhawan goes back to pull but mis-times it through square leg. There's a fielder in the deep
pitches on a good length outside off stump and shapes away from the right-hander as Rohit strides forward, covers his off stump, and shoulders arms
strays on to the pads with a length ball and Rohit tucks it off his pads towards short fine leg
good length, pitching on leg and angling across, Dhawan pushes off the front foot towards wide mid-off and sets off

Dhawan sprints through for a single after Rohit drops the ball near his feet but isn't quite sure where it is. He sees Dhawan coming and responds quickly. Broad races down the pitch as well and hits the stumps with the slide and throw. Dhawan is home though
gets hit on the pad by a short of a length ball which then goes towards the slips

edged and four! Anderson has his hands on his head. Rohit moved forward and drove away from his body at a good length ball that swung away. The outside edge flew right through where second slip was in Anderson's first over
short of a length outside off, Rohit has a swish and misses
good length just outside off stump, Rohit pushes forward and defends towards cover point
good length on off and middle, delivered from wide of the crease, Rohit stays in his crease and defends with a straight bat
fuller outside off stump, Rohit eases on to the front foot and drives towards wide mid-off

oh my, four overthrows plus the single. Dhawan got a thick inside edge to an incoming delivery and ran a single in front of square. Bresnan picked up and his throw to the keeper was high. Buttler jumped and got a glove on it and that deflected it wide of Morgan backing up at point. Morgan got a low bounce.
short of a length outside off, Dhawan opens the face and steers towards third man
length ball outside off stump, Rohit stays in his crease and opens the face to guide towards third man
good length on off stump, Dhawan drops the ball with close hands on the off side and they run another quick single
good length on middle and off, defended with a straight bat towards the bowler

bowled him! Through the gate. Rohit tried to drive off the front foot, and left a gap between bat and pad. Broad pitched the ball on a perfect length outside off and seamed the ball back in through the gap. The celebrations from England are a touch muted.
short of a length around off stump, Kohli drops the ball close on the off side. Dhawan wants one but gets sent back.
short of a length outside off stump, Dhawan flays the ball off the front foot in front of point, a powerful cut is stopped in the deep
a fuller ball on leg and middle, Dhawan drives straight and Bresnan takes the pace off the shot in his follow through, deflecting it towards mid-on
hits a good length and seams the ball across the left-hander, beating Dhawan's front-foot drive
a full ball on middle and off, Dhawan aims for the cover drive but the ball thuds off the inside edge behind square
Kohli moves back and across in his crease and flicks it in front of square, swift running
Dhawan gets run into by Bresnan as he attempts a quick single. No harm intended or done. Kohli was looking to cover drive but inside edged a good length ball close on the leg side
good length, excellent discipline from Broad, Kohli stays in his crease and blocks
short of a length from Broad, the ball seems to stick in the pitch, the spongy bounce giving Kohli a little more time to go back and swat through square leg
Kohli tries to drive a good length ball outside off but gets an inside edge on to his pad
Kohli gets a thick outside edge to third man and runs a single but the bad news is that the rain has got heavier and the umpires have called for the covers

and what a re-start! Dhawan gets under a short ball, he has lots of width to free his arms and so he slashes hard, sending the ball soaring over the third man boundary. His feet were in the air as he made contact
this time he waits in his crease and steers the ball along the ground to third man
Dhawan charges, maybe a bit too early because Bresnan bangs in the short one, Dhawan shapes to pull but aborts the shot at the last moment and lets it go
that's far too wide outside off, Dhawan tries to slash but can't reach it
played with soft hands towards point, a quick single attempted, Morgan throws at the batsman's end and concedes an overthrow
length ball just outside off, pushed firmly at and gets it out to deep cover
well bowled, length just outside off and beats Kohli outside off stump as he played forward
fuller just outside off, driven to extra cover
length just outside off, waited for and guided down to third man for a single
stays back and slaps from just outside off to long on
floated up, Dhawan forward and beaten as it turns past his outside edge
floated up again, on the stumps, swept without timing to backward square leg, nearly got done
swept again and hammered square, absolutely nailed it from the stumps

goes reverse this time, just a paddle off the stumps again, Bresnan goes back from short third man and slides and saves four, Bresnan pushed the boundary board back, the ball rolled back and they've given four on replay, very harsh that, couldn't be sure where the boundary was, there's no line under the padding
goes to cut and gets it to short third man
full on leg stump, dabbed through square leg and brings the 50 up

slower ball outside off, Dhawan misread it and slapped it to extra cover. Very brave from Bopara, it was a long way outside off and very slow, Dhawan reached a long way out to it and swung it from high on the bat to extra cover where Tredwell jumped up and took a solid catch
length ball on off stump, blocked back to the bowler
down leg side
length on the stumps again, pushed forward and blocked towards midwicket, they refuse a single
much fuller, forward to block on off stump, runs it out into the covers
length ball just outside off, dabbed just behind square on the off side and they take a quick run
just outside off, hangs back and dabs through point for a single
goes to cut from just outside off, doesn't time to short extra cover
floated up just outside off, played forward and ran through the covers for a single
a little straighter, worked to short long leg with the turn
down the track and whips it wide of long on, fine stroke, dragged it from outside off, didn't quite get to the pitch but still managed to thump it away
blocked on the stumps into the leg side, Buttler is up quickly to save the single
just outside off, pushed out through the covers staying on the back foot
down the track and mows to down to long on on the bounce, another slower ball and Kohli didn't pick it
full just outside off stump, driven through the covers
forward press from the stumps, runs it past the bowler and long on comes in quickly to save the second
slower ball well outside off stump, cut and gets it to point, didn't time it, would have been wide if he'd have left it
full ball on middle and off, clipped wide of midwicket for a single

slog swept, straight up in the air and Morgan takes the catch. It went up off a big top edge as Karthik went to sweep hard from off stump, Morgan came in a few yards from square leg and pouched the skier
around the wicket, dabbed to short third man, they set off for a quick single and make it
slip goes in, floated up on off stump, played forward and ran out to backward point
forward again and blocked off the stumps up the wicket
steps back to give himself room and pushed to cover point
down the track, forced something did Tredwell, he gets it over the top down to long off
length ball on the stumps, guided to point staying leg side of it

length outside off, slapped across the line and straight to mid-on where Cook takes the catch. Went very quickly to him but Cook held on. Raina just trying to force something, ended up being a swipe across the line, caught it pretty well but straight to the fielder
beaten outside off first ball, staying back and poking just outside off stump, beaten by one that slid past him from a good length
played to midwicket coming sort-of forward on the stumps, gets it too close to the fielder and Morgan saves one
full ball just outside off, a flicked drive to short extra cover

back of a length outside off, uppercuts it and finds third man! What a wicket, huge blow for England. Dhoni tried to force it away wide of third man but it got big on him and just shaped back a little, Dhoni still got it off the meat of the bat but couldn't control it and Tredwell came to his right to take a simple chance in the end
length just outside off stump, blocked to backward point
a touch fuller, waits and dabs down to third man from in the crease
blocked around the middle stump on a full length
flicked from just outside off stump to midwicket, didn't time it
big swing and a miss outside off stump, Anderson went fuller and wide of off and there was a pretty ugly wild swipe off fresh air
length on off stump, driven at and plays to short extra-cover
full outside off and bang, smashed past extra-cover, glorious timing, lovely swing of the blade
a little slower, tighter line and better length, blocked up the wicket
swept off the stumps and gets it through square leg, an Indian batsman finally picks the slower ball and nails it, great shot, one bounce four
full outside off again, driven at, doesn't get all of it and finds the cover sweeper
gives himself a little room and guides down to third man, wide of the fielder so they get two
full on off stump, punched down to long off
on off stump, pushed into the off side and there's a scampering single
round the wicket, flicked off leg stump wide of short fine-leg
tight on off stump, he pushes forward into the off side but can't get it wide of the bowler
connects with a strong sweep but he picks out the man at backward square...precious dot balls
fetches this from outside off and heaves it through straight midwicket, wide of long-on...much needed
slightly quicker to finish with, pushed square into the off side from the back foot so he keeps the strike
back-of-a-length delivery is clubbed off the front foot and lands in front of Cook at mid-on
short and angled down the leg side, half an appeal from keeper and bowler after Kohli chased it with a pull but it's called a wide
gets this wide of mid-on, was short of a length again and Kohli mowed it off the front foot through midwicket
swing and a miss outside off, was quite short again and Kohli's eyes lit up but he lost his shape a little on the shot
short and at the body, he swivels on the pull and places it wide of long leg then sprints between the wickets
charges at this one, it's a touch fuller outside off and by giving himself a touch of room outside then can't make contact
slower-ball bouncer outside off loops through to Buttler and is called wide...important extra deliveries in this over
low, wide full toss outside off...Kohli has to stretch for it but gets enough bat to place it wide of backward of point and wide of third man
starts with a short ball and Jadeja gets into a bit of a tangle as he goes to hoick it through leg and it beats the top edge
steps outside leg, it's short of a length and he runs it to short third man

dropped, that could be a big moment...Trott at short third man didn't quite time his jump properly and palmed the chance over his. Kohli stepped to leg then aimed to cut over the off side and it should have been held
banged in at Jadeja's body, he goes for the pull but it dribbles off the bottom edge back to the bowler
fuller outside off, Jadeja clears his left leg and tries to drive but it comes off a thick outside edge to backward point
that's huge...that damages the over for Broad and England. This time Kohli connected very cleanly against the short ball and pulled it miles into the stands at deep square-leg
what a shot, that is awesome from Jadeja...a full delivery on off stump, he gives himself a touch of room and drives it on the up over wide long-off. Stunning.
goes in the air down the ground, ooh would that have carried to Cook if he'd committed? Instead he let it bounce in front of him

gone this time...important blow for England which may just quell this late charge. Kohli tried to clear long-off, had a huge swing at a full delivery, it comes off the lower part of the bat, and Bopara steadies himself well under the chance
well bowled from Anderson, beats the top edge with a short ball as Jadeja steps to leg...the bowler followed him which cramped him for room
that's what he was trying the ball before, third man is inside the circle and he cuts this short delivery well clear of the fielder...using Anderson's pace
a quick bouncer to finish with, Jadeja again stepping to leg to open up the off side but his attempt mow over covers doesn't make contact
short ball at the body, plays a rather half-hearted pull which comes off the top edge but falls well clear of any of the leg-side fielders...importantly it gets Jadeja on strike

dead-eye straight down the ground but it came nowhere off the middle...loops down the ground and their attempt to come back for a second ends in a run out as Ashwin is beaten by the direct hit from long-off by Ian Bell
good yorker which he can only dig out down to long-off

back of a length, he gets very deep in the crease and tucks it off his hip to deep square...he almost stepped on his stumps. In fact, he may actually have stepped on them but the bails didn't come off
that's big, and very useful for India...pitched up on leg stump and Jadeja connects cleanly through the line with a very strong bottom hand and clears long-on
the final ball is short again, lobs into the off side through midwicket and they make it back for a second

inn2.comm: length on off stump, dabbed to point
fuller, just outside off, left alone
just short of a good length, room outside off to dab down to third man
plays back on the stumps and gets a thick inside edge from off stump through square leg
leg side on a length, clipped down to long leg
full length outside off, Bell gets down low to try and square drive, gets an under edge towards point
full on off stump, blocked firmly back to the bowler
off stump on a good length, goes to press forward and gets it back to the bowler off the inner half of the bat
very full well outside off, Cook chases it and misses with a drive
back of a length, Cook goes to pull and is there way to soon and gets a little under edge on the bounce to Dhoni

goes to back cut and guides it to slip where Ashwin has taken a fine catch to his right with two hands at shoulder height. The delivery got there quicker than Cook was expecting and took the shoulder of the bat as he went to late cut, presenting a chance that Ashwin bagged. The line was too close to cut
length ball on the stumps, flicked out through square leg, they run hard and get three
back of a length just outside off, dabbed through cover point and they get a couple
full on the pads, poor ball, clipped wide of midwicket with excellent timing, you don't make a living bowling there to Trott
a foot outside off on a good length, dabbed to point
played forward just outside off stump, pushed to cover
too wide outside off and slapped wide of point, another poor ball and Trott puts it away well
back of a length on off stump, Trott gets on top of it and opens the face, guiding it down to third man
poor line on the pads, Trott will be disappointed to clip only to long leg
back foot push just outside off, it left Bell a little and he got a thick outside edge to third man, shaped away a bit outside off
on the pads again, Trott flicks in the air over midwicket and gets two, didn't get all of it and it was heart in mouth for a moment but cleared the fielder
bumper, Trott goes to hook and gets hurried and misses, well bowled
fuller ball just outside off, dabbed down to third man
length on middle and leg, Bell flicks wide of long leg and gets a couple
forward press just outside off, runs it through cover to the sweeper
waited for the turn and pressed in front of point for a single
well bowled, turn away and it beats the outside edge as Trott played back
taken from off stump to midwicket on the back foot
forward press to extra-cover, firmly struck but finds the fielder
Trott again forward this time gets it down to long off
around the wicket, swept at, struck on the pad, pitched outside leg stump

turn down the leg side, Trott falls outside his ground and Dhoni stumps him super work from Dhoni. Trott falling over having tried to flick it to leg, it turned away from him - for a wide - but of course you can be stumped off a wide and Dhoni obliged with sharp hands
forward on leg stump flicking to midwicket
drops this short and gets pulled but only for a single out to deep square leg
back on the stumps playing with spin, leg slip is in, Bell plays short of that fielder
back and I thought he was going to cut but pulls from outside off down to long on
forward, again a bit of turn, beats the inside edge and strikes the pad well outside leg stump
down the wicket, Bell takes one in the midriff looking to play to leg, it runs behind square on the off side and Root calls them through for a very sharp single, good call
width just outside off, cut backward of point and they get two wide of third man
two more, this time wide of deep midwicket pulling a ball only slightly short of a length just outside off
stays back and dabs from just outside off down to third man
off stump delivery, again angled towards third man, it's running slowly towards the fielder and they run hard and get two
back of a length outside off, Bell goes to pull and misses completely
just outside off, pressed hard into the covers and they take a single to the fielder's left
down the track and chipped down the ground, comes off the inner half of the bat and bloops down towards long on
pressed from outside off into the covers

pulled and gets a top edge and Sharma comes in from deep backward square and takes the catch! India right into the game with another wicket. It was a back of a length ball on leg stump, Root went to pull and it came off a top edge and Sharma was able to take a few strides forward and take the catch
turn down the led side for a wide, Bell well in his ground, turned a long way
played from the stumps up the wicket on the back foot
goes back and pushed with the spin through square leg but Raina at short leg fields well and saves the single
very full on the stumps, ran down to long on
short ball, Bell stepped away from it too much and got a toe of the bat to extra cover
oh shot, reverse sweep over backward point, no-one at point an Bell lifts it down to the third man rope, timed it well

driven at giving himself room, there's an appeal for another stumping, sharp work from Dhoni again, how far did Bell drag his back foot? He lifted it slightly, it is so close, a frame in it, is there conclusive evidence? By a whisker either way this is but it's given out! Goodness me could the third umpire be sure there? I'm not so sure but Bell has to go. He stepped to leg to drive over the top, missed and dragged his foot enough outside his ground
length ball, dabbed to second slip from off stump
blocked from off stump up the wicket
just outside off stump, dabbed towards backward point, Bopara sends Morgan back
played forward just outside off, a genuine nick and it's just short of first slip
the slider, Morgan nearly caught out blocking on the stumps
back of a length, turn and bounce and Morgan pulls out of the cut stroke
forward press up the wicket from the stumps
forward press into the covers again
full ball on the pads, flicked at and it runs to Dhoni off the pads
back of a length, cut out through point to the sweeper
length ball just outside off, played forward and pushed to short extra cover
full and wide and slapped over the covers, nicely struck and gets it wide of the sweeper
room again outside off, pushed at and gets it through point, the sweeper is able to cut this off
back of a length on the leg stump, whipped down just wide enough to long leg for two
on the back foot, played to the leg side
swept hard from off stump, wanted two to deep square but he didn't risk it
pushed gently down the ground to long-on
touch short outside off, and it's brilliantly placed by Morgan as he flicks his wrists at the last minute to place it wide of the cover sweeper
comes forward and drives down to long off
full on off stump, Bopara flicks it out to midwicket
tight to the body, but short enough for Morgan to late cut down to third man
width outside off, Bopara throws everything through his drive but only gets a single to deep cover for his efforts
worked from outside off and tucked into midwicket...Dhoni not happy that the fielder was on his heels
short of a length, he stays deep in the crease and flicks out to deep square leg
he misses out when he cuts a short delivery straight to cover
presses forward, pushes firmly towards cover who is on the edge of circle rather than saving the single
round the wicket, pushed gently into the leg side
turn there for Raina, Bopara defends and gets an inside edge down between his legs
now this one goes straight on and beats the outside edge...nice bowling
plays this very late, chops towards short third man from close to off stump
that's a ripper! Pitched on middle and leg then ripped past Morgan's outside edge. Unplayable.
comes in with the arm, Morgan drops it square into the off side to keep the strike
starts well, short of a length on off stump, Morgan can only drop it by his feet and Ishant follows through quickly
tight to the body again, this time he can get a single into the off side but India won't mind ones and twos
short ball and Bopara pulls it without much timing to deep square-leg
delicate shot, waits and guides down to third man, but again just another single
short ball, goes high down the ground with a flat-batted pull which hangs in the air then plugs in the outfield near the long-on boundary...not great running
that's big! This time he latches onto a good-length ball and launches it high over midwicket to silence the majority of this crowd
more turn, takes a thick outside along the ground wide of slip to short third man
sweeps this in front of square, stretched well forward to reach it, and picks the gap between deep midwicket and deep square...Dhawan sprawls near the boundary and makes a good save
quicker on off stump, pushed to the covers
swept square again from off stump
there's the shot that has made him famous, the powerful reverse sweep over short third-man...shaped very early to play the shot and placed it perfectly
worked into the leg side
touch short, placed very neatly through midwicket with the perfect weight on the shot to allow them back for a second
the turn squares up Bopara as he plays to the off side
another cracking blow from Bopara...brings out the sweep and connects cleanly to send it over deep square-leg. That's the fifty stand, too
tries a repeat but misses out
short again, worked off the back foot through midwicket and some fumbling from Ishant allows them back for a second
waits for this, tucked through square leg and that's more superb running as it's placed between three fielders...in the end Dhoni races after it...12 off the over
swing and a miss to a short ball outside off stump...precious dot ball. Was a slower ball, so credit to Ishant
clean hit! Short on leg stump, awful delivery, and Morgan hooks it away off leg stump with even elevation to skim over the boundary
extra ball, extra run...that's pressure...sprayed wide outside off stump
another wide, he's losing the plot in this over, and this one barely hits the cut strip

what a moment! Zero to hero in the space of a ball. Tries to pick this up from outside off over midwicket, but it was quite wide and it looped off the bottom of the bat towards the man inside the circle. To be fair to Ishant, that was quite ballsy as he rolled his fingers across the seam and it deceived Morgan
and another! That could be the game. A short ball, Bopara drills it out of the middle of the bat but picks out the square leg inside the circle
top ball! Blimey. Short of a length, jags away from Bresnan and beats the outside edge
another short delivery, steps to leg and carves it down to third man so it will be Bresnan to take strike
worked off leg stump out to deep midwicket...he had a slip in place for that ball
there you go...floated up on middle stump, he has a huge heave, is nowhere near it and gets his middle stump hit. Not Buttler's finest hour
driven off the back foot to cover, picks out cover and sets off straight away...Broad dives and, for some reason, Jadeja doesn't even attempt to take the bails off
England imploding! Went for the sweep, huge appeal for lbw which was given not out, Bresnan charged out for the run which was never on and Rohit was quickly in from cover with Bresnan stranded
heave across the line, balls bobbles from the pad into the off side and it could have been another run out
full and drilled down the ground, Broad was desperate to come back for a second but there was no chance

big turn, big swing and a miss from Broad...neat take from Dhoni, they check for stumping but the dot ball is just as important. In fact, it was close to another stumping but this time Oxenford decided the foot wasn't raised
low full toss, he sweeps it cleanly off the stumps and beats square leg who is inside the circle
short outside off, it turns and Broad can only get the bottom of the bat towards cover

it's all happened there! Tredwell cracks it towards mid-off where the fielder makes an excellent one-handed diving save then there's a run-out appeal, but Broad just makes it back to the non-striker's end
goes straight down the ground, but not with much power, and it lobs towards long-on...another couple
beaten by the turn! India win! Was a touch short, went to carve it off the back foot and missed. Job done by Ashwin
